name: Super Coin Pusher 2000 3D Arcade Edition
description:
Small game simulating a coin pusher. Now in 3D !

Video Game Lag game jam 2021 entry from Gold_Falcon and Loowood.

Play by using spacebare to drop coins. 

Try to push a maximum of coins out of the level by dropping strategically your coins or just spam space and watch the chaos unfold.

Musics :  Pixel adventures by marcelofg55

Medieval: The Bard's Tale by RandomMind

Underwater Theme by CleytonKauffman

Somewhere in the Elevator by You're Perfect Studio

Sound effects :  https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle
